name: Natero
long_description:
Natero helps Customer Success Managers reduce churn, increase expansion, and manage more accounts with less effort.

Natero is the only Customer Success solution to combine predictive analytics, customer intelligence, and workflow management in a unified platform. This next generation solution helps B2B software providers prioritize, automate, and scale their Customer Success processes.
one_liner: Data-driven customer success platform for B2B SaaS.

name: WorkRamp
long_description: WorkRamp is the All-in-One Learning Platform that your executives, employees, and customers will love. WorkRamp advances learning as a growth engine for your business with a flexible platform that empowers teams to develop top talent, exceed revenue targets, and inspire customers to become advocates. With a flexible, All-in-One Learning Platform, WorkRamp redefines the LMS for the modern workplace to help executives recognize learning as a growth engine and one of the most strategic investments an organization can make. See why top learning teams at Box, Outreach, and Reddit trust WorkRamp to drive business outcomes and organizational scale.
one_liner: The All-in-One Learning Platform

name: Herald
long_description:
Herald helps product and customer teams work together to grow  revenue by painting a full picture of user problems.

We start by providing the best experience for capturing customer feedback from the most relevant apps: Intercom, Front, Email, Slack, and more. Then, Herald's robust analytical engine helps you rigorously qualify and quantify customer feedback according to your business goals.

Herald molds to the way your team works: it can be used exclusively as an internal tool, in semi-private mode to share a history of their feedback with specific customers, or publicly by publishing a  product roadmap and changelog.
one_liner: A collaborative repository for user feedback.

name: Chatwoot
long_description: Chatwoot is an open-source omnichannel customer engagement suite built as an alternative to Intercom, Zendesk etc. Chatwoot helps you to connect email, website live chat, social media handles, WhatsApp etc. and manage all your customer interactions from one place.
one_liner: Open-source customer engagement suite, alternative to Intercom

name: FlowEQ
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; Pleasanton, CA, USA
long_description: FlowEQ is the trusted provider of workflow automation for teams that need to accelerate their work, especially complex processes and high-volume workflows that require human judgment. The FlowEQ Workflow Acceleration Platform includes interactive decision trees that are used by customer support, operations and product teams across all industries to improve accuracy and speed up important recurring work. Using FlowEQ customers get through high-stake recurring workflows 10x faster, saving their companies time and money every day. For additional information, visit www.floweq.com.
one_liner: No-code workflow tool

name: Abbot
long_description: Abbot helps customer-facing teams work with their customers in Slack. Abbot watches activity to make sure that customers get replies quickly. Once Abbot joins a room, it summarizes conversations, tags relevant topics, and even suggests next steps. Abbot's Insights make it easy to see your team's responsiveness at a glance. Want to automate common tasks? Abbot's built-in Skills functionality (think: small bits of code we run for you) can be triggered by customer topics, on a schedule, in response to external webhooks, or directly from chat.
one_liner: Your Customer Success Co-Pilot

name: Beau
all_locations: Barcelona, CT, Spain; CT, Spain; Remote
long_description: Beau helps to work with people outside your company: build, visualize, and automate your customer-facing processes! 🔥 All with one, easy-to-use solution: collect forms, accept payments, keep updated, request details, and approve steps!
one_liner: Workflows for repetitive customer-facing tasks

name: Atlas
long_description:
Atlas is a modern, all-in-one customer support platform that is built with AI first. We help you solve your customers problems faster by understanding them more completely with a suite of customer tools like session recording, bug tracking, and event feeds. You can think of us as the next generation Zendesk / Intercom combined with Log Rocket and Linear.

Learn More: https://atlas.so/

Products:
- Chat Widget
- Ticketing
- Omni channel Support (chat, email, WhatsApp, Slack Connect, and SMS)
- Customer Timeline
- Session Recording
- Help Center
- AI Chatbot
- Customer Insights
one_liner: Modern customer support platform replacement for Intercom and Zendesk

name: Sero
one_liner: Customer onboarding built for B2B SaaS

name: Onboard.io
long_description: Onboard is a SaaS which automates & streamlines the customer onboarding & implementation process. Easily create dynamic launch plans (customized per customer), which are collaborative with clients and visible to all stakeholders.  Onboard is built for onboarding by a team that spent a better part of the last decade onboarding some of the worlds largest brands.
one_liner: Manage & automate customer onboarding and implementation

name: Zoltar Labs
all_locations: New York, NY, USA; Mountain View, CA, USA
one_liner: AI-assisted CX tool built with your knowledge.

name: Parabolic
long_description:
Parabolic is an AI assistant that autodrafts ready-to-send responses for your customer support team. 

Equip your team with the best possible response at their fingertips.
one_liner: AI assistant for customer support

name: OpenSight
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; Sunnyvale, CA, USA; Remote
long_description: OpenSight helps companies quickly scale up their support function and resolve customers' questions much faster. With the latest advancement in LLMs, OpenSight offers accurate answers and action resolution paths resolving >70% of inbound customer inquiries.
one_liner: AI-powered customer support automation for fast-growing companies

name: Frigade
long_description:
Frigade AI is an in-app assistant that intelligently guides and onboards your users through your product. Our agent learns your product's interface, gives contextual guidance that adapts to each user, and takes actions directly on your users' behalf.

Learn more at Frigade.ai
one_liner: AI-powered product assistance for modern software teams

name: Inkeep
long_description:
Inkeep provides all the AI tools teams need to scale support: an assistant for users, a copilot for support agents, and an AI writer to identify and fix content gaps. 

Teams like Anthropic, Pinecone, and Postman trust Inkeep to help their users find what they need and get high quality human support when they need it.

Inkeep "just works" with your existing tools - ingest any source, add to any help center or docs site, integrate with any ticketing platform, and our APIs to create custom experiences and automate workflows.
one_liner: AI support you can trust.

name: Ariglad
long_description:
Founded in Vancouver, British Columbia, Ariglad The first AI platform that integrates with support channels and release notes to auto-maintain your knowledge base. Ariglad suggests new articles, updates existing ones, detects duplicates, and merges them. Basically, it puts your knowledge base maintenance on auto-pilot.

This is led by Co-Founders Sophie and Ali. They are both completely obsessed with this problem and their customers, who have partnered with Ariglad to become immensely more efficient.
one_liner: Knowledge base maintenance on auto-pilot

name: Clueso
long_description: Clueso is the fastest and easiest way for companies to generate high-quality instructional videos and documentation, ideal for customer education/onboarding and employee training. Our AI transforms simple screen-recordings into studio-quality videos and step-by-step documentation in minutes.
one_liner: Create beautiful videos & docs for any product or process in minutes

name: Pylon
long_description:
Pylon is the modern alternative to Zendesk, Intercom, Freshdesk, and Salesforce Service Cloud. We help B2B companies track customer support issues across common B2B channels including shared Slack channels (Slack Connect), Microsoft Teams, email, in-app chat, ticket forms, Slack community, and more.

Hundreds of fast-growing YC companies of all sizes like Vellum, Hightouch, and Deel are customers.

Learn more at usepylon.com
one_liner: The only customer support platform built for B2B.

name: Berry
long_description:
Berry offers an AI CSM that scales customer success for SaaS companies.

Every post-sales organization faces the challenge of scaling customer success without having to hire more. Berry combines the best of the two worlds - taking the white-glove onboarding experience and offering it at scale. 

Our AI CSM onboards, trains and grows accounts for you non-stop. It’s a 10x hire to your team - at a fraction of the cost.
one_liner: Scale customer success and onboarding with AI

name: Lysto
long_description: Lysto is an AI CRM that updates itself by pulling and structuring data from emails, messages, calls, and product analytics. With this context, Lysto helps you know what to do next, and generate the content you need to engage customers with full context.
one_liner: AI CRM that updates itself

name: Assembly
long_description: Assembly is a customer experience platform that turns customer feedback into product growth and support requests into long-lasting relationships.
one_liner: Build Magical Customer Experiences

name: Decipher AI
long_description:
Decipher’s AI agents watch all your user sessions – helping you identify and act on product issues and insights. 

Loved by fast-growing companies like Exa, Pinecone, and 11x.
one_liner: AI that analyzes your session replays to uncover issues and behavior.

name: Overstand Labs
long_description:
If you’re a founder and feel like you—or your exec team—are too far removed from the customer, Overstand is here to help. We’re the platform (and API) for your customer communications, turning Slack, emails, WhatsApp, call recordings, and more into actionable insights. For example, we can help you discover feature requests hidden in customer emails, spot upsell opportunities from a casual Slack message, or identify a critical support issue buried in a call transcript -- all without having to depend on others in your company to fill out a form or write meeting notes.

Get back to Founder Mode by spotting trends, uncovering growth opportunities, and staying deeply connected to your customers. Overstand makes it easy to understand where you’re needed most and take action that drives impact. 🚀
one_liner: We help business leaders get back into Founder Mode

name: Intryc
long_description: Consumer enterprises have millions of customer support tickets annually. They need to constantly evaluate support agents’ performance and compliance. Typically they evaluate less than 5% of those interactions manually which is slow, expensive and not scalable. Intryc's AI can evaluate 100% of all customer interactions, in real time, at half the cost.
one_liner: Intryc uses AI to automate quality assurance for customer support

name: Edgedive
long_description:
Listening to your customers is really hard at scale. Edgedive makes it easy.

We collect, tag, and synthesize all incoming feedback from every channel and link it to your CRM so you Product, Eng, and CX teams can focus on building what their customers want.

🔎 Answer any question about anything your customers are saying

🎫 Automatically tag support tickets & quantify revenue impact

🗣️ Schedule custom, automatic voice of customer reports

💸 Identify gaps leading to churn or closed-lost deals

🧪 Get  a shortlist good beta testers for any feature

🤩 Monitor customer reactions to launches, live

…all in seconds, not days (or weeks).
one_liner: Understand what your customers are actually saying
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: Lyra
long_description:
At Lyra, we believe B2B sales hasn’t meaningfully evolved in decades — until now. The next industrial revolution is here, and we’re building the platform to power it.

Modern buyers want less talk, faster decisions, and seamless experiences. Lyra helps sales teams close more deals, shorten sales cycles, and operate more efficiently — all with minimal rep involvement.

We built our own meeting software from the ground up with a real-time AI agent at its core:
- Surfaces and personalizes relevant sales collateral using live conversation intelligence
- Keeps deals moving by answering buyer questions when reps are offline
- Replaces decks, screen shares, and long email threads with a single interactive workspace — called a Lyra. It hosts your meetings, onboarding, and integrates tools like DocuSign to give buyers a seamless path from first call to signed contract

Hundreds of sales calls are already hosted on Lyra, including several YC companies. We hit $100K ARR in our first two weeks.

We’re rethinking the sales stack from first call to signed contract.
one_liner: AI-Native Zoom For Revenue Teams

name: Human Behavior
long_description: Human Behavior uses vision models to watch all user web sessions so you know exactly how users use every part of your product.
one_liner: We reveal why users stay, leave, or pay

name: Lapel
long_description:
Lapel is building a customer operations platform that brings hospitality to the internet: tools to power every touchpoint across sales, success, and support.

Today, most teams manage relationships through dashboards, funnels, and canned replies—great for metrics, terrible for humans. We believe online customer relationships should feel personal, not transactional.

Learn more at lapel.com
one_liner: Scale personalized service to every customer.
